text: But when her owners saw that their hope of profit was gone, they seized Paul and Silas and dragged them into the market place to the rulers,This was a put up job. It would take a day or two to make clear that the girl was now useless. The magistrates had probably been getting a ‘cut’. Some rabble had been mobilized to join in—the whole proceeding had been organized in advance. They figured they could beat up on two Jews with impunity.
